## createMedia variable

Apply styles when viewport width is greater than or equal to AND/OR less than the specified breakpoint.

**Signature:**

```typescript
createMedia: <Breakpoints extends {
    [name: string]: number;
}>({ breakpoints, }: {
    breakpoints: Breakpoints;
}) => {
    breakpointStyles: (args: { [Breakpoint in keyof Breakpoints]?: {
        gte?: Styles | undefined;
        lt?: Styles | undefined;
    } | undefined; }) => import("@emotion/utils").SerializedStyles;
    Media: import("react").ComponentType<import("@artsy/fresnel/dist/Media").MediaProps<keyof Breakpoints, never>>;
    MediaContextProvider: import("react").ComponentType<import("@artsy/fresnel/dist/Media").MediaContextProviderProps<keyof Breakpoints> & {
        children: import("react").ReactNode;
    }>;
    mediaStyles: string;
}
```
